name: Hoverboard Rush Racing Simulator -Hover Board Game
name_original: Hoverboard Rush Racing Simulator -Hover Board Game
description:
Take the Hoverboard Rush Simulator Racing Hill Challenge across the sandy desert. Drift and race your hoverboard and Beat everyone's score! Watch out for crazy obstacles.

[How to play]
- Move your fingers left and right to move on this crazy hoverboard
- Avoid cars and obstacles

More coming soon!
